cyclone.name: FRANKLIN
cyclone.current_location: about 280 mi SSW of San Juan, Puerto Rico
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing west-northwest for another day, then forecast to make a sharp turn north toward the south coast of Hispaniola and then northward into the western Atlantic east of the Bahamas.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Haiti entire south coast from Anse d'Hainault eastward to the Dominican Republic border, and Dominican Republic south coast eastward to Isla Saona
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Hispaniola, portions of Puerto Rico, and adjacent Caribbean waters
weather_observation.wind: Brief gusty squalls possible; tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely (<5% chance).
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may bring 1â€“3 inches of rain with brief heavy downpours Monday into Tuesday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and dangerous rip currents in surrounding Caribbean waters may affect port operations.
